subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dwyane Wade shook off a bruised left shoulder to score 35 points, and the Heat got back to the .500 mark for the first time in three months with a 104-85 win over the Portland Trail Blazers last night in Miami.
snippet: Dwyane Wade shook off a bruised left shoulder to score 35 points, and the Heat got back to the .500 mark for the first time in three months with a 104-85 win over the Portland Trail Blazers last night in Miami.
